Text: AfricaJeff My name is Tom Mashington and Im a Construction Project Manager for EES in their Philadelphia office A few weeks ago I received in the mail a Enron newsletter which contained a feature of you and your interests While reading the article I noticed that youre into Anything Africa Two years ago I was working in Ghana West Africa on a cogen plant with Stone Webster Most US citizens have no idea what the conditions are like in these rd world countries I was curious as to how many trips youve made to the subSaharan section of the continent and to which countries you have visited Earlier I was discussing my African experience with Marty Sunde I sent him a few ebony wood carvings purchased from the local villagers These pieces were hand carved by artisans in the area If you have a moment you should stop by his office on the th floor where he has them on display I have also attached the files containing a few digital photos from the area where I lived and worked These are primarily photos from the local villages near the plant While youre viewing the photos you should be able to recognize me Im the only American looking individual in the tribe Enjoy Tom Mashington
